name: Legend of Heroes
description:
This is an Idle RPG game. You are the only hero who can save the world and lead the most powerful troops to fight against the evil forces. You can break through the levels and get various equipment to become more powerful and be able to challenge more powerful bosses, and you can also form a guild with like-minded friends to fight against the evil invasion. The goddess will bless you!

Featured Systems

  • ◆Hero System◆
    There are dozens of heroes to choose from, with different professions, and different styles of genres can be formed through different combinations;
    The combination of different heroes can form diversified combinations, facing different enemies need to use to different combinations, in order to easily deal with;
    Heroes are divided into five attributes, each attribute has its own characteristics of the hero;

  • ◆City System◆
    You can build your own city and get more rewards by sending your heroes there.

  • ◆Rich Levels◆
    Dozens of levels with different difficulties for players to explore, dozens of BOSS with different strengths waiting for players to challenge, the legend is created by you! You can choose to fight against the evil BOSS with your comrades, or face the heavy challenging difficulties alone.

  • ◆Diverse Equipment◆
    Hundreds of pieces of equipment are randomly dropped from different BOSSes, and with patience, all equipment can be obtained. The different environments you face, the different equipment you choose, the skill and strategy coexist. Advanced equipment also has a set of effects, a set can get a great strength to improve!

  • ◆Holy relics◆
    There are five Sacred Artifacts in total, each with the effects of Stun, Shield, Heal, Defense, and Forbidden Healing, which can be used in battle after equipping them.

  • ◆Guild System◆
    Join a guild and get great rewards by completing guild quests!
    Participate in guild wars to get more rewards
.

Feature Gameplay

  • ◆Groups and Heroes ◆
    Join hands with players from other servers to capture cities, you are no longer enemies, but allies.
  • ◆The Throne of Destiny◆
    Send all your 12-star heroes into battle against players from around the globe!

  • ◆Guild Gameplay◆
    Guild Replica: Guild members can participate at any time, and you can get rewards by dealing damage to the Guild BOSS. Kill the BOSS to get more rewards and advance to the next level
    Guild Battle: Battle for the city with 3 other guilds and receive rewards based on the final ranking
    Guild Battle: Seize the resource points on the map, and get rich rewards after occupying them for a certain period of time
    Pirate Ship Exploration: Guild members explore the mysterious map belonging to their own guild together, and various events can be randomly triggered on the map, such as treasure chests, merchants, pirates and so on.

  • ◆World BOSS◆
    Each World BOSS requires a different hero with different attributes.
    All players who participate in the event can get rewards for killing the BOSS, and killers can get extra rewards.

  • ◆Hall of Honor◆
    Divine Wargame: Choose 7 heroes to join the lineup and fight with other players, the more victories you have, the more rewards you will receive, and the round will end after 7 consecutive victories!
    Time Link: You can get rewards if you get on the list, and you can also compete with players from other countries in the rankings.
    Ladder of Valor: Defeat other players to get points and raise the level, and then seasonal rewards will be issued according to the level.
    Battle of Sanctuary: Each player can send three teams to compete with other players around the world, and get rewards according to the points ranking at the end of each season.

  • ◆Relic Palace◆
    Endless Expedition: A total of 9 levels, defeat the monsters to get the rewards, you can challenge once a day!
    Labyrinth Expedition: In the labyrinth, heroes can't recover after being injured or killed in battle. You need to explore the labyrinth one by one, which will trigger many unknown events.
    Ancient Ruins: You need to send different heroes to enter three ancient ruins, and you can use the materials obtained to exchange for very precious items
.
